summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Honey Farm e-commerce website. All core functionality working correctly including product catalog, filtering, cart, admin panel, and order system.

design_issues.issue: Missing DialogTitle and Description for accessibility
design_issues.details: Console warnings about missing DialogTitle and aria-describedby for screen reader accessibility

passed_tests: Backend API - All 16 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with products and categories
Category filtering works correctly (Мёд shows 5 products, Все shows 21 products)
Product modal opens and displays weight options
Empty cart displays 'Ваши товары тут' message
Order form accepts name and phone input
WhatsApp and Telegram order buttons present
Admin login works with correct credentials (armanuha/secretboost1)
Admin panel shows 21 products and 6 categories
All admin CRUD operations tested successfully
